title: 自制整合包崩溃，有Crash Report
author: CommanderCody
txt_content:
本帖最后由 lichi2050 于 2016-1-17 21:48 编辑 

自己做的整合包崩溃了，本人小白，读不懂Crash Report, 求助……


---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// But it works on my machine.

Time: 16-1-17 下午5:12
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

replies.author: sam3737
replies.txt_content: 你的RC不完整，缺少蒸汽魔法的文件，建议去作者官网或RC站内搬运贴看看

replies.author: xiaoxiaokulipa
replies.txt_content: 删除RC，貌似是缺少一个文件，当然你也可以去RC的站内搬运帖问一问
